amendment.description: An amendment numbered 50 printed in House Report 115-259 to prioritize funding for the construction of facilities that NNSA needs t o meet its mission.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Lujan Grisham, M. amendment was withdrawn.
Amendment (A030) offered by Ms. Lujan Grisham, M..
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A030) offered by Ms. Lujan Grisham, M..
